item.title: Test
item.description: Test Test 测试 Hugo 的自动刷新功能 主题: LoveIt #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { cout << "Hello World!" << endl; } A wise man once said nothing at all — Drake $latex$ $$ c = \pm\sqrt{a^2 + b^2} $$ Second
